topic.title: How to get to 8chan on zeronet?
topic.body: I've never used this before (sorry). Is it normal that my windows are opening in chrome ? is there a dedicated browser or a prefered one ? And what is the 8chan address ?(not planning on shooting anyone btw just like to browse x).

1566943829_16d7z17EBBMxJGH51mdT51jwrHtCL.body:
> [moor](#comment_192_17zoTjVZEBUdo6uAvQvtbih7ibBMHQRsrH): preferably use tor browser with 0net tor mode always on.

Why ? I got nothing to hide so far :) I use tor to order "stuff" online.

> [moor](#comment_193_17zoTjVZEBUdo6uAvQvtbih7ibBMHQRsrH): its safer, use tor for a while...i think 8chan address is:http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/

Hey thanks ! I found that one but I only get a logo and a link to "millichan" but that link results in a failed content download.

1566944519_1587xjW5S4aJd1JKmLEsv1WRruZoW.body: What If you can't ? Cuz you're sick ?
